DOC.brief_summary: Working toward Wellness telephone care management outreach monitor program design help Medicaid recipients experience major depression enter remain evidence-based treatment . To study effect Working toward Wellness , individual receive Medicaid Rhode Island eligible mental health service United Behavioral Health screen telephone depression . Those found major depression agree study randomly assign . Program participant receive intensive monitoring Master 's level clinician call care manager facilitate support clinical treatment . The control group receive usual care include referral mental health treatment provider . The study hypothesis telephonic care management would increase visit mental health professional use appropriate medication , turn would reduce depression severity lead great employment productivity work .
DOC.criteria: Score 5 high Quick Inventory Depression Symptomatology receive Medicaid least one child household Bipolar disorder alcohol substance abuse currently active treatment depression receive Supplemental Security Income
